items.sentence: Tom wanted to kiss Mary goodbye, but knew he shouldn\'t.

Tom doesn\'t need to tell me what to do. I already know.
Tom doesn\'t really know French well enough to teach it.
Tom doesn\'t think anything bad is ever going to happen.
Tom checked Mary\'s pulse to see if she was still alive.
Tom didn\'t get paid as much as he thought he was worth.
Tom, Mary and John are playing cards in the living room.
When we were young, we never got along too well, did we?
Why is it important to be at the meeting this afternoon?
Just because he\'s wise doesn\'t mean that he\'s honest.
I can\'t believe you don\'t want butter on your popcorn.

Tom has been waiting for us for the past thirty minutes.
